mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_SERIAL_NO WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 AND UPPER(TABLE_NAME) = UPPER(#{tableName}) limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_SERIAL_NO SET SERIAL_NO = SERIAL_NO + 1 WHERE PID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_SERIAL_NO( PID, TABLE_NAME, BEGIN_DATE, SERIAL_NO, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_USER_ID, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0 )
